before_layer_change_gcode:
; #### Start of Before layer change g-code ####
;[layer_z]
G92 E0
; #### End of Before layer change g-code ####
change_extrusion_role_gcode:
; ####Start of change extrusion role G-Code ####
; ####END of change extrusion role G-Code ####
change_filament_gcode:
; ####Start of change filament G-Code ####
G2 Z{z_after_toolchange + 0.4} I0.86 J0.86 P1 F10000 ; spiral lift a little from second lift
G1 X42 Y180 F30000
G1 Z{z_after_toolchange} F600
; ####End of change filament G-Code ####
layer_change_gcode:
; #### Start of Layer change g-code ####
;[layer_z]
; #### End of Layer change g-code ####
machine_end_gcode:
; #### Start of Machine End g-code ####
END_PRINT
; #### End of Machine End g-code ####
machine_pause_gcode:
; ####Start of Pause G-Code ####
PAUSE
; ####End of Pause G-Code ####
machine_start_gcode:
; ####Start of change Machine start G-code####
; Beginning machine start sequence
START_PRINT EXTRUDER_TEMP=[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] BED_TEMP=[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
; Loading initial filament
T[initial_no_support_extruder]
; Setting acceleration to 2000
M204 S2000
; Setting nozzle temperature
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]
; Setting relative extrusion mode
M83
; Resetting extruder position
G92 E0
; Starting nozzle wipe
SAFE_WIPE_V2
; Drawing purge line
CUSTOM_PURGE_LINE
; Machine start complete - ready to print!
; ####End of change Machine start G-code####
name: My-K1C-0.4-Noz
